3.10.0.0.message: Fixed a bug where the `TE` (transfer-encoding) header would not be sent to the upstream gRPC servers when `grpc-web` or `grpc-gateweay` are in use.

3.9.0.1.message: Fixed a bug where the `TE` (transfer-encoding) header would not be sent to the upstream gRPC servers when `grpc-web` or `grpc-gateweay` are in use.

3.8.0.0.message: When there is a JSON decoding error, respond with status 400 and error information in the body instead of status 500.

3.4.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where an array with one element would fail to be encoded.
Fixed an issue where empty (all default value) messages couldnâ€™t be unframed correctly.[#10836](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10836)

3.3.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where having a `null` value in the JSON payload caused an uncaught exception to be thrown during `pb.encode`.[#10687](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10687)
Fixed an issue where empty arrays in JSON were incorrectly encoded as `"{}"`. They are now encoded as `"[]"` to comply with standards.[#10790](https://github.com/Kong/kong/pull/10790)
